title: [Glimae'den Wildwood, Trail]
description: The trail flattens out here, traversing along even ground through a recently maintained break in the brush.  Aromatic sassafras, with its hand-shaped lobed leaves, is predominant in this forested area, thriving in spite of the moon-silhouetted stands of beech and aspen.

The trail flattens out here, traversing along even ground through a recently maintained break in the brush.  Aromatic sassafras, with its hand-shaped lobed leaves, is predominant in this forested area, thriving in spite of the sun-dappling stands of beech and aspen.

The trail flattens out here, traversing along even ground through a recently maintained break in the brush.  Branching off to the east is a a smooth sandy path.  Aromatic sassafras, with its hand-shaped lobed leaves, is predominant in this forested area, thriving in spite of the moon-silhouetted stands of beech and aspen.
